Raleigh.Captrust Tower: CAPTRUST Tower at North Hills is a 17-story 260 feet (79 m) mixed use skyscraper located at North Hills in Raleigh, North Carolina. The tower opened in the fall of 2009. It has 274,000 square feet (25,500 m2) of office space and 28,400 square feet (2,640 m2) of retail space.
